snippet: The Senate majority leader said he began changing his mind after seeing the struggles of people who would have been helped by the drug.
abstract: Senate majority leader Harry Reid says lawmakers should ease their opposition to medical marijuana; says he began changing his mind after seeing the struggles of people who would have been helped by the drug.
lead_paragraph: The Senate majority leader said he began changing his mind after seeing the struggles of people who would have been helped by the drug.
